title: Bitcoin Price Drops With MicroStrategy’s X Account Exploit
description:
Business intelligence firm MicroStrategy fell victim to a malicious hacking incident, leading to losses exceeding $440,000. The breach occurred through MicroStrategy’s X account, where hackers posted deceptive links promoting a fraudulent airdrop of an alleged “official” Ethereum-based MSTR token. The phishing scam enticed users to click on the malicious links, redirecting them to a counterfeit […]
